name: Deluge
description: Deluge is a BitTorrent client. It supports plugins management, seed exchanging, download speed limitation, multithread downloading, file preview, download directory selection, queue management and other functions.

en_US.description: Deluge is a BitTorrent client. It supports plugins management, seed exchanging, download speed limitation, multithread downloading, file preview, download directory selection, queue management and other functions.
en_US.name: Deluge

zh_CN.description: Deluge是一个BitTorrent客户端软件，它支持插件管理、种子交换、下载限速以及多个线程同时下载、文件预览、选择下载目录、队列管理资源等功能。
zh_CN.name: Deluge
